quote: These next few months, the winter months, the holiday season, if you will... view it as separation season.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional view of the holiday season as downtime.
suggested_hook: Are you using the holiday season to get ahead or falling behind?

quote: If you're committed to your goal, the holidays, the weather, other people's actions leave you absolutely unfazed.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the difference between being committed and merely interested.
suggested_hook: Are you truly committed to your goals or just interested?
